input.sentences: it was a wonderful st. [male] 's day parade .
even the policemen were wearing their ribbons with pride .
the bagpipes were playing their irish tunes .
the end of the parade brought many drummers playing .
output.sentences: We are having a wonderful time at the st. patties parade!
They are playing the song that goes "Yir a grand ole' flag, Yir a high flying flag".
Most of the people are wearing ribbons to symbolize pride in their heritage.
I really can't stand that all their playing are Irish tunes.
Oh, I'm so happy there are drummers playing at the parade this year!
